bioAsHtml: Joe is the JVM Languages Owner at Heroku, a cloud application platform supporting Java, Scala, Clojure, Groovy and JRuby. He’s worked with the JVM for over a decade as both an application architect and a consultant specializing in deployment. Joe maintains Warbler, a tool for packaging JRuby applications into WAR files. JRuby was the topic of his first book from the Pragmatic Bookshelf, but he’s also written books on remote pair programming and the health issues associated being a programmer.

acceptedTalks.title: The Twelve Factor app: Best Practices for Java Deployment

bio: Joe is the JVM Languages Owner at Heroku, a cloud application platform supporting Java, Scala, Clojure, Groovy and JRuby.
